# init(coder:)

**Initializer**

Creates a view by deserializing from the specified coder.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency required dynamic init?(coder: NSCoder)
```

## Parameters

- **coder**: An object from which the view deserializes.

## Overview

This property inherits from [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/UIKit/UIView].

## Creating a room-capture view

- **init(frame:arSession:)**: Creates a room-capture view with the given AR session.
- **init(frame:)**: Creates a view that sizes to the specified frame.
